entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:59 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
